solution_line_template: Half of the distance up the flagpole is {flagpole_length}/{half_divisor} = <<{flagpole_length}/{half_divisor}={half_mast_distance}>>{half_mast_distance} feet.

Thus, Harold moved the flag {flagpole_length} up + {half_mast_distance} down + {half_mast_distance} up + {flagpole_length} down = <<{flagpole_length}+{half_mast_distance}+{half_mast_distance}+{flagpole_length}={total_distance_moved}>>{total_distance_moved} feet.
